channel.title: Workshop problem with SteamCMD (Dedicated Server)
channel.description:
Hi! I encountered a problem with SteamCMD and it's [b]workshop_download_item[/b] feature. I get this error when I'm trying to download a Workshop item for Black Mesa:
[tt]Update workshop job for app 362890 canceled: Failed to request decryption key for depot 362890 (Access Denied) (Missing decryption key)[/tt]
I think that this happens because Black Mesa Dedicated Server is on Steam as another product and not as a tool for Black Mesa. :wink: The only way to use Workshop addons is to install them manually.

item.title: Workshop problem with SteamCMD (Dedicated Server)
item.dc:creator: Awesomeness_0714
item.description:
Hi!
I encountered a problem with SteamCMD and it’s workshop_download_item feature.
I get this error when I’m trying to download a Workshop item for Black Mesa:

[tt]Update workshop job for app 362890 canceled: Failed to request decryption key for depot 362890 (Access Denied) (Missing decryption key)[/tt]

I think that this happens because Black Mesa Dedicated Server is on Steam as another product and not as a tool for Black Mesa.
The only way to use Workshop addons is to install them manually.

Read full topic
